summary: This is an FBI crisis intake report documenting a social media tip received on July 8, 2019. The tip references a Twitter thread about allegations involving Jeffrey Epstein and Donald Trump, which was automatically flagged by the FBI's monitoring system for containing the keyword 'attack'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named in the case title for child sex trafficking and referenced in the social media tip as part of allegations involving Donald Trump.

persons.name: DougScott357
persons.role: Twitter user who submitted the tip
persons.context: Twitter user whose rhetorical comment referencing allegations about Jeffrey Epstein and Donald Trump was forwarded to the FBI's National Threat Operations Center.

persons.name: Sarah K Silverman
persons.role: Twitter user referenced in the tip
persons.context: Twitter user whose thread about Jeffrey Epstein was referenced in the tip submitted by DougScott357.

persons.name: Iansmadrig
persons.role: Twitter user referenced in the tip
persons.context: Twitter user whose thread within Sarah K Silverman's tweet referenced allegations involving Jeffrey Epstein and Donald Trump.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Referenced in the social media tip regarding allegations made by a then 13-year-old girl in 1994 of a repeated assault at Epstein's house.

connections.description: Referenced together in a social media tip alleging an assault by Trump at Epstein's house in 1994.

events.title: Alleged assault at Epstein's house
events.description: Referenced allegation made by a then 13-year-old girl of a repeated assault by then Donald Trump at Jeffrey Epstein's house.

events.title: FBI receives social media tip
events.description: The FBI's Office of Public Affairs forwards a tweet from user @DougScott357 to the National Threat Operations Center via tips.fbi.gov, triggering a crisis intake report.

keyFacts: The FBI received a social media tip on July 8, 2019, referencing allegations from 1994 involving Jeffrey Epstein and Donald Trump.
The tip was automatically generated by the FBI's social media monitoring system after detecting the keyword 'attack' in a tweet.
The tweet referenced a thread by Twitter user @SarahKSilverman, which contained a thread by @iansmadrig about the allegations.
The FBI case is officially titled regarding Jeffrey Epstein and child sex trafficking (Case ID #: 31E-NY-3027571).
The document shows the FBI's process for assessing public tips received through social media channels.
